DPRK Ambassador to Equatorial Guinea Appointed
   Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Chun Bong was appointed as the DPRK ambassador e.p. to the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
